Github Pages Tutorial

Why Github Pages? because it's fantastic!

Github Pages is an incredibly useful tool to host websites for you or any of your projects! If you would like to create a website, but you do not know how to write HTML, you have found the right place. This tutorial will guide you how to set up a website on GitHub, how to set up specialized websites for your projects.

  • git, GitHub and GitHub Pages
  • Creating GitHub Pages with markdown
  • Creating special Project Pages using orphaned GitHub branches
